name: Hash Browns
steps: Peel the potatoes and grate them using the large holes of a box grater.
Squeeze out as much moisture as possible with a potato ricer or a cloth towel.

Heat oil in a large frying pan on medium-high heat. Once heated, add grated potatoes, spreading them out evenly along the bottom of the pan. The potatoes should not be too thick in any one place -- about 1/4 to 1/2-inch thick.
Cook until crispy and golden brown on both sides.
